pkgmetadata.longdescription: Knock Errors Off Nice Guesses // Miscellaneous functions and data used in Qingyao's psychological research and teaching. Keng currently could test the significance and compute the cut-off values of Pearson's r without raw data. Keng could also compare lm()'s fitted outputs using R-squared and PRE (Proportional Reduction in Error, also called partial R-squared or partial Eta-squared).
